item.title: "Brother Big Li" Huang Licheng's 5x Leveraged Long Position Faces $3.86 Million Unrealized Loss
item.description: On July 22nd, as per the monitoring of OnchainLens, because PUMP dropped below its public sale price of $0.004, the "Big Brother Pump" Huang Licheng's PUMP 5x leveraged long position is currently facing a floating loss of $3.86 million. He also holds ETH 25x and HYPE 5x long positions, with a combined floating loss of $2.3 million.

item.title: Each Strategy Share is now up 20.8% against Bitcoin since the beginning of the year, with TD Cowen restating a $680 target price for MSTR.
item.description: On July 22nd: The investment bank TD Cowen stated that a strategic premium is reasonable. After increasing its holdings of BTC by an additional 6,220 coins last week, a portion of MSTR stock now represents 20.8% more Bitcoin than it did on January 1st. TD Cowen reaffirmed a target price of $680 for MSTR stock and anticipates that by 2027, the Strategy will hold nearly 900,000 BTC. The flywheel strategy of the Bitcoin treasury will continue to drive its momentum.

item.title: Binance Alpha has launched Delphinus Lab (ZKWASM)
item.description: On July 22nd, Binance Alpha has now initiated Delphinus Lab (ZKWASM).

item.title: Security Report: At Least 3500 Websites Affected by Malicious Injection of Hidden Monero Mining Script
item.description: On July 22nd, as per the report by Decrypt, researchers from the cybersecurity firm c/side stated that malicious Monero XMR mining software has launched an attack on multiple websites, marking a new surge of cryptojacking. At least 3,500 websites are currently operating with maliciously injected hidden Monero mining scripts. In contrast to traditional cryptojacking, these malicious software limit CPU usage and conceal traffic within WebSocket streams, thus evading the typical indicators of cryptojacking. Hackers are adhering to a "keep a low profile and mine slowly" strategy, targeting unpatched websites and e-commerce servers.

item.title: The top holder of PUMP tokens deposited 17 billion PUMP tokens to the trading platform, worth $89.5 million.
item.description: On July 22nd, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, once the PUMP price dropped below its private/public sale price of 0.004 USD. The holder with the largest amount of PUMP, who had previously put in 100 million USDC to purchase 25 billion PUMP in a private sale round, has reloaded 17 billion PUMP onto the trading platform through FalconX, which is worth 89.5 million USD, and still holds 8 billion PUMP, with a value of 29.58 million USD.In addition, the second-largest holder of PUMP, who had previously spent 50 million USD to buy 12.5 billion PUMP, with a value of 71.37 million USD, has now transferred it all to the trading platform.

item.title: Founder of Gyroscope: How Does Gyroscope's Dynamic Liquidity Pool Outperform Traditional Pools?
item.description: On July 22nd, Ariah Klages-Mundt, a co-founder of Gyroscope, pointed out in a post that High Volume does not equal High LP Yield. Due to efficient utilization of capital and an intelligent pricing mechanism, Gyroscope's Dynamic Liquidity Pool is able to achieve a sustainable and relatively high native pool APR (Annual Percentage Rate). In contrast, some trading pools like Uniswap/Aerodrome, although they create high trading volume through "slippage", this type of high trading APR masks arbitrage losses and does not truly bring actual returns to LPs. Metrics such as those from Dune Data - Markouts PnL are key indicators for measuring LP's real returns. As shown in the graph for the ETH/USDC trading pair, the yield of Gyroscope's Dynamic Liquidity Pool is significantly higher than that of other trading pools.Currently, many LPs are struggling to maintain a break-even point in Uni/Aero pools, while using Gyroscope's Dynamic Liquidity Pool (Dynamic E-CLP) model can easily achieve a more

item.title: Binance Alpha will list Yala (YALA) with an airdrop point threshold of 238 points.
item.description: On July 22nd, Binance Alpha is set to list Yala (YALA), and trading will commence on July 22, 2025, at 8:00 PM (UTC+8). Eligible users will be able to claim a 200 YALA token airdrop using Alpha Points on the event page within 24 hours after trading begins.The Binance Alpha airdrop will occur in two phases:Phase 1 (first 18 hours): Users with at least 238 Alpha Points can make the airdrop claim.Phase 2 (last 6 hours): Users with at least 200 Alpha Points can participate in the airdrop on a first-come, first-served basis. If the rewards are not fully distributed, the points threshold will decrease by 10 points per hour.It should be noted that claiming the airdrop will cost 15 Alpha Points, and users must confirm the claim on the Alpha event page within 24 hours; otherwise, it will be considered a forfeiture.

item.title: Bybit will launch the FARTCOIN Perpetual Swap Contract
item.description: On July 22nd, Bybit is set to launch the FARTCOIN U Perpetual Contract.

item.title: Bybit to Launch INJ and HBAR USDT-Margined Perpetual Contracts
item.description: On July 22nd, Bybit is going to list INJ and HBAR USDT Perpetual Contracts.

item.title: Falcon Finance plans to withdraw all funds from CEX and establish a new Asset Transparency Page
item.description: On July 22nd, the co-founder of DWF Labs and Andrei Grachev of Falcon Finance announced that Falcon Finance plans to withdraw all funds from centralized exchanges and has received a confirmation letter from their auditor. Falcon Finance will launch a new asset transparency page this week and is currently engaged in working on the design structure.
